name: If Stars Align: Z Day
description:
A trial RPG

"It was supposed to be like any other regular day, a young boy walking around a huge city suddenly finds himself alone with no other individual in sight. The primary goal was arriving at his school, however, it seems like there is something else in store."

Developer's Note:

The game is not complete enough to be called a demo game, and I'm new to programming on RPG Maker MZ (and I don't have any plugins bought and installed at the moment). Regardless, I hope that anyone who considers trying out this game will have a good time.
